# Introduction

**rtemislive** is organized in modules.
The user can toggle modules ON and OFF using the first drop-down menu on the
top right.

Custom installations allow to specify whether a dataset should be pre-loaded
and allow setting the initial state of most application settings, including
modules and themes.

<br><br>
The documentation on this site ir organized by module: each chapter,
accessible from the navigation in the lest, corresponds to an individual module.

<br><br>
**rtemislive** is built on top of [**rtemis**](https://rtemis.lambdamd.org)

Data operations, including filtering, selecting and a subset of data aggregation operations, performed in real time using `data.table`.
